flavor: You helped found a community. Where was it? Why was it created? You might have helped to plan the settlement, or you might have spent some time laying bricks with your own two hands. Was the process part of a simpler life, or was it a prelude to your adventuring career? Did you learn to do battle while patrolling its half-constructed walls? A town with your own personal stamp on it might serve as a worthy base of operations, and its people might clamor for your protection.    When was the last time you were there? name: Founder
